price: (99) [For such is the state of the disbelievers] until, when death comes to one of them, he says, "My Lord, send me back
arabic: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءَ أَحَدَهُمُ ٱلۡمَوۡتُ قَالَ رَبِّ ٱرۡجِعُونِ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: ḥattā idhā jāa aḥadahumu al-mawtu qāla rabbi ir'jiʿūni
